subject: Pedals doesn’t not include haptics!
description_text: ﻿Hello I ordered these pedals which came after the original delivery date and they do not include the VAM haptic reactors. Order number: #SSN5550

conversations.body_text: Hi Will Maloney,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks—they're incredibly popular. We'll ship yours out within the next couple of days.

I don’t understand how this could happen but ok thank you very much I’ll be looking forward to them.
Sent from my iPhone

>

Are the mounting brackets for the haptics included in the pedal kit that I bought?

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Will Maloney,  When you purchased the vibration motor, you selected the bundle that includes the U-shaped bracket. In most cases, this bundle comes with the bracket included.
Hi Will Maloney,  I’ve checked your order, and it includes the vertically mounted bracket by default.

Ok thank you. I will be looking forward to the haptic motors.
Sent from my iPhone

>

Is there any way I can get some type of compensation? I am missing out on sim races that I was suppose to compete in but I don’t want to set everything up and have to take it all apart again.

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Will Maloney,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224807305

So you guys can’t do any type of compensation? It took far longer than when you said they were going to be shipping my haptics .

Sent from my iPhone

>
